tiles.title: Batch server configuration
tiles.description: Shows the batch server configuration settings

tiles.title: Batch server #tasks execution spread
tiles.description: Shows the number of tasks that are picked up by the different batch AOS instances.

tiles.title: Throttled batch tasks
tiles.description: Shows the running tasks in a 10 minute timeslice, along with the throttled tasks.

tiles.title: Priority distribution
tiles.description: Shows the number of tasks by priority.

tiles.title: Available batch threads
tiles.description: Shows the number of threads available per AOS over time.

tiles.title: Batch execution history
tiles.description: Shows batch jobs execution information. Information available includes starting time, completion time, class information and activity ids

tiles.title: Throttled batch tasks
tiles.description: Shows the running tasks in a 10 minute timeslice, along with the throttled tasks.

tiles.title: Throttled batch tasks
tiles.description: Shows the running tasks in a 10 minute timeslice, along with the throttled tasks.

tiles.title: Batch exceptions
tiles.description: This shows the exceptions encountered during batch scheduling or execution. This contains also platform level exceptions that don't reach the Infolog error messages.

tiles.title: Batch Infolog Errors
tiles.description: This shows Infolog error messages coming from batch workloads.

tiles.title: Batch exceptions over time
tiles.description: This shows the exceptions encountered during batch scheduling or execution. This contains also platform level exceptions that don't reach the Infolog error messages.

tiles.title: Batch Infolog Errors
tiles.description: This shows Infolog error messages coming from batch workloads.

tiles.title: PBS Queue sizes
tiles.description: Shows the PBS queues and how many tasks are waiting in those specific queues at any given point in time.

parameters.description: Identification of the activity interacting with forms

queries.text:
customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where name == "BatchThreadInfo"
| extend    customDimensionsParsed  = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    infoMessageParsed       = parse_json(tostring(customDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage))
| parse     customDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage with * "GetCountCurrentBatchTasks " CountConcurrentBatchTasks ", TaskQueueCount " TaskQueueCount ", GetMaxConcurrentBatchTasks " maxBatchThreads ", GetReservedNumberOfThreads " numOfReservedBatchThreads "."
| summarize   arg_max(timestamp, maxBatchThreads)
            , arg_max(timestamp, numOfReservedBatchThreads) by cloud_RoleInstance
| project     ["Batch AOS"]             = cloud_RoleInstance
            , ["Max Threads"]           = maxBatchThreads
            , ["Reserved Threads"]      = numOfReservedBatchThreads
| order by ["Batch AOS"] asc

customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name == "BatchTaskStart"
| extend    customDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    batchJobId  = customDimensionsParsed.batchJobId
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(batchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| extend    batchAOSArray  = split(cloud_RoleInstance, "-")
| extend    batchAOS       = strcat(batchAOSArray[0])
| project   batchAOS
| summarize count() by batchAOS
| order by  batchAOS asc

let _scale = '10m';
customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name in ("BatchThrottled", "BatchTaskStart")
| extend    customDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    batchJobId  = customDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(batchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| summarize ThrottledTasks = countif(name == "BatchThrottled"), RunningTasks = countif(name  == "BatchTaskStart") by TimeSum=bin(timestamp, totimespan(_scale))
| project TimeSum, RunningTasks, ThrottledTasks
| order by TimeSum asc

customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name == "BatchTaskStart"
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed  = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    InfoMessageParsed       = parse_json(tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage))
| extend    Priority                = iif(isnotempty(tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.Priority)), tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.Priority), 'Normal') // Ensuring that when enabling the telemetry to test, we account for potential missing initial values)
| extend    BatchTaskId             = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchTaskId)
| distinct  BatchTaskId, Priority
| summarize count() by Priority

customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name == "BatchThreadInfo"
| extend    customDimensionsParsed  = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    infoMessageParsed       = parse_json(tostring(customDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage))
| parse     customDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage with * "GetCountCurrentBatchTasks " CountConcurrentBatchTasks ", TaskQueueCount " TaskQueueCount ", GetMaxConcurrentBatchTasks " maxBatchThreads ", GetReservedNumberOfThreads " numOfReservedBatchThreads "."
| project     timestamp
            , roleInstance              = cloud_RoleInstance
            , usedThreads               = CountConcurrentBatchTasks
            , maxBatchThreads           = maxBatchThreads
            , numOfReservedBatchThreads = numOfReservedBatchThreads
| project   timestamp, Batch = tostring(split(roleInstance, "-")[0]), AvailableThreads = todecimal(maxBatchThreads) - todecimal(usedThreads) - todecimal(numOfReservedBatchThreads)

customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name in ("BatchTaskStart","BatchTaskFinished","BatchTaskFailure")
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    InfoMessageParsed   = parse_json(tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage))
| extend    ActivityId          = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.activityId)
| extend    ClassName           = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ClassName)
| extend    BatchJobId          = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId)
| extend    BatchJobTaskId1      = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobTaskId)
| extend    BatchJobTaskId2      = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchTaskId)
| extend    BatchJobTaskId      = iif(isnotempty(BatchJobTaskId1), BatchJobTaskId1, BatchJobTaskId2) // Temporary trick until the batch team synchronizes the field names across events
//| where isempty(_batchAOS) or cloud_RoleInstance in(_batchAOS)
| extend    StartTime           = iff(name == "BatchTaskStart"    , timestamp, datetime(null))
| extend    EndTime             = iff(name == "BatchTaskFinished"   , timestamp, datetime(null))
| extend    ErrorTime           = iff(name == "BatchTaskFailure"   , timestamp, datetime(null))
| extend    RetryCount          = iff(name == "BatchTaskStart"    , InfoMessageParsed.RetryCount, "")
| project   StartTime, EndTime,ErrorTime,RetryCount, ActivityId, ClassName, BatchJobId, RoleInstance = cloud_RoleInstance, BatchJobTaskId
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(BatchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| summarize   StartTime         = min(StartTime),
              CompletionTime    = max(EndTime),
              ErrorTime         = max(ErrorTime),
              RetryCount        = take_any(RetryCount),
              ClassName         = any(ClassName), 
              BatchJobId        = any(BatchJobId),
              BatchJobTaskId    = any(BatchJobTaskId),
              RoleInstance      = any(RoleInstance)
by ActivityId
| where isnotempty(StartTime)
| extend BatchAOS = strcat(split(RoleInstance, "-")[0])
| project ActivityId, BatchAOS, BatchJobId, BatchJobTaskId, ClassName, StartTime, CompletionTime, ElapsedTime = CompletionTime - StartTime, RetryCount

let _scale = '10m';
customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name in ("BatchThrottled", "BatchTaskStart")
| extend    customDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    batchJobId  = customDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(batchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| summarize ThrottledTasks = countif(name == "BatchThrottled"), RunningTasks = countif(name  == "BatchTaskStart") by TimeSum=bin(timestamp, totimespan(_scale))
| project TimeSum, RunningTasks, ThrottledTasks
| order by TimeSum asc

let _scale = '10m';
customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name == "BatchThrottled"
| extend    customDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    BatchJobId          = customDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId  // this is actually always 0
| extend    EventId             = customDimensionsParsed.eventId
| extend    EnvironmentId       = customDimensionsParsed.environmentId
| extend    LegalEntity         = customDimensionsParsed.LegalEntity
| extend    ActivityId          = customDimensionsParsed.activityId
| extend    EventMessage        = customDimensionsParsed.EventMessage
| extend    InfoMessage         = customDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage
| extend    InfoMessageParsed       = parse_json(tostring(InfoMessage))
| extend    CurrentMachineCPU       = round(toreal(InfoMessageParsed.CurrentMachineCpu), 0)
| extend    CurrentMachineMemory    = InfoMessageParsed.CurrentMachineMemory
| extend    CurrentSqlDtu           = InfoMessageParsed.CurrentSqlDtu
| project   timestamp, EventId, name, user_Id, session_Id, cloud_RoleInstance, EnvironmentId, LegalEntity, ActivityId, EventMessage, CurrentMachineCPU, CurrentMachineMemory, CurrentSqlDtu

// BatchTaskFailure is providing Exceptions in the batch execution. 
// These events are providing exception information that is often not covered by infolog errors, but exceptions that are thrown during batch processing and batch scheduling.
customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name in ("BatchTaskFailure")
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    BatchJobCaption     = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobCaption)
| extend    ActivityId          = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.activityId)
| extend    ClassName           = iif((tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ClassName) == "<empty>"), "", tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ClassName))
| extend    BatchJobId          = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId)
| extend    BatchTaskId         = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchTaskId)
| extend    EventMessage        = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.EventMessage)
| extend    ExceptionType       = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ExceptionType)
| extend    ExceptionMessage    = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ExceptionMessage)
| extend    CallStack           = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.CallStack)
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(BatchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| project   TimeStamp = timestamp, RoleInstance = cloud_RoleInstance, ActivityId, BatchJobCaption, ClassName, BatchJobId, BatchTaskId, EventMessage, ExceptionType, ExceptionMessage, CallStack

exceptions
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    ExecutionMode   = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ExecutionMode)
| extend    BatchJobId      = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId)
| extend    BatchJobCaption = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobCaption)
| extend    ActivityId      = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.activityId)
| extend    MethodName      = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.MethodName)
| extend    ClassName       = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ClassName)
| extend    CallStack       = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.CallStack)
| where     ExecutionMode   == "Batch"
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(BatchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| project   TimeStamp = timestamp, ActivityId, BatchJobId, BatchJobCaption, OuterMessage = outerMessage, CallStack

// BatchTaskFailure is providing Exceptions in the batch execution. 
// These events are providing exception information that is often not covered by infolog errors, but exceptions that are thrown during batch processing and batch scheduling.
customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name in ("BatchTaskFailure")
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    BatchJobId          = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId)
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(BatchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| summarize TotalFailures = count() by bin(timestamp, 10m)

exceptions
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    ExecutionMode   = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.ExecutionMode)
| extend    BatchJobId      = tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId)
| where     ExecutionMode   == "Batch"
| where     isempty(_batchJobId) or tostring(BatchJobId) in (_batchJobId)
| summarize TotalErrors = count() by bin(timestamp, 10m)

customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where     name == "BatchQueuesDetails"
| extend    CustomDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    InfoMessageParsed = parse_json(tostring(CustomDimensionsParsed.InfoMessage))
| extend    BatchLowSchedulingQueue                 = toint(InfoMessageParsed.BatchLowSchedulingQueue)
| extend    BatchNormalSchedulingQueue              = toint(InfoMessageParsed.BatchNormalSchedulingQueue)
| extend    BatchHighSchedulingQueue                = toint(InfoMessageParsed.BatchHighSchedulingQueue)
| extend    BatchCriticalSchedulingQueue            = toint(InfoMessageParsed.BatchCriticalSchedulingQueue)
| extend    BatchReservedCapacitySchedulingQueue    = toint(InfoMessageParsed.BatchReservedCapacitySchedulingQueue)
| extend    ReadyTasksBuffer                        = toint(InfoMessageParsed.ReadyTasksBuffer)
| extend    ReadyTasksBufferWithPriorities          = toint(InfoMessageParsed.ReadyTasksBufferWithPriorities)
| project timestamp, BatchLowSchedulingQueue, BatchNormalSchedulingQueue, BatchHighSchedulingQueue, BatchReservedCapacitySchedulingQueue, ReadyTasksBuffer, ReadyTasksBufferWithPriorities

pageViews
| extend ActivityId = tostring(customDimensions.activityId)
| distinct ActivityId

customEvents
| where     timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| extend    customDimensionsParsed = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend    BatchJobId  = tostring(customDimensionsParsed.BatchJobId)
| distinct  BatchJobId
| order by  BatchJobId asc
